resources.string: Banks Won’t Rush to Hold Crypto – But OCC’s Regulatory Approval Makes It Harder to Ignore

Microsoft’s Xbox games showcase felt like more of a showcase for the Xbox Game Pass than the Xbox Series X console. Microsoft has demonstrated the future of its content that will go beyond owning an Xbox device.

If you were heading into Microsofts Xbox game showcase yesterday to witness a demonstration of why next-gen gaming and the worlds most powerful console matter, you were probably left a little disappo.
